categories: Category:Starshipwrights and Aerospace Engineers Incorporated products

nodes.text: Starshipwrights and Aerospace Engineers Incorporated was a company that specialized in producing customized cruiser upgrades and starship modifications. The company began as a small affair, but through a franchising system, the business grew to a megacorporation inside three hundred years. They were a voting sponsor to the Corporate Sector Authority, having invested in the Corporate Sector in the years following the establishment of the Corporate Sector Charter. The company produced the Sun Skipper 2000 Sun Jammer.
